website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced model with a few issues. The upside is the long warranty and attentive customer service.
pros: Features include Bluetooth and an MP3 player
The BOSS tops the pack for its superior 3-year online dealer warranty
cons: Static and distortion in the sound have been reported
The quality of the remote is questionable, and buttons have been known to quit working

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something cheap to put on my beach GolfCart. This deck does the job and gets it done well. Only complaint about this deck is that whenever the Bluetooth is connecting their static noise for about two seconds before it connects to your phone. So if you’re connecting your phone Bluetooth to it make sure the volume is turned down or you’ll get blasted with white noise
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Excelent marinized radio system
customer_reviews.text: + Overall music performance it is really good, but yet not 5 stars. - Small buttons are left located together, it needs concentration all time to operate it properly, especially in the dark. + SD/USB/AUX-slots are easy smart accessible! - Removing the front is sometimes difficult. + Mounting and cable plug&play is very easy (keep bracket removal tools on a good place with your extra keys!) - Little plastic front frame hooks can easily brake off (once use snap function). + Remote control works very handy with all functions on a motoryacht while sit.
customer_reviews.author: PaulWelink

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth in to all my music on my golf cart....
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit for the money.make sure you buy a good fm antenna with it....
customer_reviews.author: Swat

customer_reviews.title: Okay not very fond of boss radios. This is ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay not very fond of boss radios. This is my second one and very cheap and they don't last prolly go to name brand on my next one for ex. kenwood...........
customer_reviews.author: Big AL

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and the features that are included with this haed u it. I installed this into my USA trailer fairing on my motorcycle. It is very loud, and the controls are easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: eagle2338

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: My first one went out almost immediately, but they replaced it no questions asked and my new one has worked great. Very fast Bluetooth connection and great sound
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my tracker targa 18 with 4 of the Boss LED speakers. Works well and sound quality is decent for the money. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It was great .......while it worked. Overheated in my bike stereo set up and had to be replaced after a month
customer_reviews.author: Vulcan Prince

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used as a replacement on my boat. Great sound and love the Bluetooth capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pica

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I put this radio on my golf cart. Easy to install, and great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne s

customer_reviews.title: JUnk!
customer_reviews.text: Got caught in one rain event..5 mins..and stereo stopped working..No sound! NOT VERY HAPPY as i just got it in march! Update... They sent me another one to replace... 3 weeks..cuts out intermittently.. now quit working...fed up and done!!!
customer_reviews.author: jelling72

customer_reviews.title: Exact product needed
customer_reviews.text: I already had this product in my boat and the screen failed, was glad i could find exact same model and to just swap out. Great radio for the price
customer_reviews.author: Matt Westrate

customer_reviews.title: Good Value at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for a very cheap price. I have this in my 19 ft boat and the quality is much better than the stock system that i replaced. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Binky

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Last two weeks and died. You definitely get what you pay for. Spend the extra money and get a reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Will do for now until we find something better.
customer_reviews.text: Radio has a lot of static. Several buttons on the remote do not work (including the volume button). Will do for now until we find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Janette425

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: lots of features and looks and sounds great for under $100
customer_reviews.author: 4aboat

customer_reviews.title: RCA output quit working after 5 trips
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine until 5th trip and RCA outputs quit working
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS JUNK, NOT WORTH BUYING !
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked for one day... The display went out after the first day... JUNK !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work straight out of the box. Power going to it, fuses good, reset the reset button and nothing. Sent back for refund and ordered a Sony.
customer_reviews.author: rhicks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option for Jeep owners
customer_reviews.text: This radio is the perfect addition to any Wrangler that is prone to getting caught in the rain with the top down! The sound quality is great and the features, although very simple with no frills, definitely get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I stuck this radio in my Jeep and overall am very happy with it so far. The Bluetooth works great, the waterproofing didn’t hold up as well as I’d hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Should have listen to the other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Thought i would give this a try even though it had more 1 star reviews than anything. Opened box applied 12vdc and nothing. This is the first thing i ever purchased that was dead on arrival. And even more disappointing was the fact it had a wire for constant voltage (memory). This is sold and advertised on Boss web sit as Zero Current Draw memory. So why the memory wire??? oh well glad i caught it during the return policy period.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works very good for what it is and for the price. No, it won't blast your boat or have a super quality sound. It just works. And does not seem to lose the memory even after days of being disconnected from the battery. Big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turns of when any small load is on it. Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Turns off when you turn the volume above 19. Turns off when any pumps start to run. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID A BASTIANSEN

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my motorcycle faring.. It was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have had to replace this radio more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Jack West

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: This only lasted a month, would not recognize BT on 4 different phones. Tried calling customer support couldn’t help???
customer_reviews.author: Donnie white

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast shipping and great customer support The installation instructions were a bit unclear with respect to the memory hold up voltage but a quick call to tech support and I’m rocking out on the boat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems MR508UABS Marine Stereo - Single Din, Bluetooth, CD MP3 WMA USB AM FM Radio, Weatherproof
product_meta.description: Style:Bluetooth CD ReceiverGet your boat rocking with the BOSS Audio MR508UABS Silver Weatherproof CD Player. Listen to your favorite CD, catch the latest tunes on the AM/FM radio, or hook your smartphone or MP3 Player up through the Auxiliary Input. For more musical options plug into the USB port and ride the waves while listening to your own tunes. A wireless remote keeps you in control of all your options. Bluetooth technology lets you play and control your favorite music apps like Spotify and Pandora and make calls hands-free. State-of-the-art weatherproofing materials and special UV protection coatings provide resistance to corrosion and protection from the elements. Leave the dock to the sounds of the BOSS Audio MR508UABS.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth Hands Free (Make and receive calls), Bluetooth Audio Streaming (Play and control music and apps like Spotify / Pandora wirelessly)
Plays Bluetooth / USB / MP3 / WMA, AM/FM Radio, Digital MEDIA, Auxiliary In Compatible with Audio out from Smartphones and MP3 Players (No CD Player)
Front Panel UV Coating, PC Board with Conformal Coating
50 Watts x 4 Max Power, Balance / Fader / Bass / Treble and Preset built-in EQ
Dimensions: Depth 7 x Width 7.1 x Height 2.1 Inches, Weight: 3.2

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars87 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
